name: Confedratia Nationala a Sindicatelor libere din Romania - Fratia
goal: Apararea drepturilor economice si sociale ale salariatior din federatiile si sindicatele nationale care formeaza Confederatia
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Politici sociale sanatate si securitate la locul de munca
Reprezentarea salariatilor
Promovarea si apararea drepturilor salariatilor
Dezvoltare economica si ocupare
Educatia adultilor
